title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official CLI and server for running large language models locally with minimal setup.
highlights: run Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3 locally

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for integrating Ollama models into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama, supports multi-model chats.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot proxy that uses local Ollama models instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & CPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Next.js chat UI that streams responses from local Ollama models.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: GitHub Actions workflows to benchmark and CI-test Ollama models.

title: ollama-plugin-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM summarization & completion via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community node for n8n that enables no-code workflows with local Ollama models.
